flawed_nl_solution:
After paying off the cost of ingredients, Andrew has $400 - $100 = $<<400-100=300>>300
Since half of the money goes to the homeless shelter, the shelter receives $300 / 2 = $<<300/2=150>>150
After contributing some of his own money, Andrew donates $150 + $10 = $<<150+10=165>>165 to the shelter.
#### 165

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 160, not 165. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
